body_html: The submodules are required for the current cmake setup to work right now, but they are not all used at compile time unless you pass e.g. -DUSE_MPI=ON . The default modules that will be used (if they are found) can all be seen starting here https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/CMakeLists.txt#L27 . To build without one of these modules, pass the corresponding flag to your cmake command e.g. -DUSE_GLOO=OFF .
body_text: The submodules are required for the current cmake setup to work right now, but they are not all used at compile time unless you pass e.g. -DUSE_MPI=ON . To build without one of these modules, pass the corresponding flag to your cmake command e.g. -DUSE_GLOO=OFF .
body: The submodules are required for the current cmake setup to work right now, but they are not all used at compile time unless you pass e.g. -DUSE_MPI=ON . The default modules that will be used (if they are found) can all be seen starting here https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/CMakeLists.txt#L27 . To build without one of these modules, pass the corresponding flag to your cmake command e.g. -DUSE_GLOO=OFF .
